edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache

Interface SourceCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cache

    public interface SourceCache
extends Cache
    Interface to be implemented by caches that cache source images.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.io.File getImageFile(Identifier identifier)
      Returns a File for a source image corresponding to the given identifier, or null if a non-expired source image corresponding to the given identifier does not exist in the cache..

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache.Cache

        cleanUp, purge, purgeExpired, purgeImage

    • Method Detail

      • getImageFile

        java.io.File getImageFile(Identifier identifier)
                   throws CacheException

        Returns a File for a source image corresponding to the given identifier, or null if a non-expired source image corresponding to the given identifier does not exist in the cache..

        If an image corresponding to the given identifier exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it before returning null.

        If the desired image is being written in another thread, this method should block while waiting for it to complete.

        Clients must not use the returned File for writing. They should use getImageOutputStream(Identifier) instead.

        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of an image to read from the cache.
        Returns:
        File corresponding to the given identifier, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given identifier does not exist in the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • getImageOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(Identifier identifier)
                                   throws CacheException
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of an image to write to the cache.
        Returns:
        Output stream to which an image corresponding to the given identifier can be written.
        Throws:
        CacheException
